gate.creole.measurements

Class Measurement

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.creole.measurements.Measurement

  • public class Measurement
extends Object
    Instances of this class represent a single measurement as recognised by the MeasurementsParser.
    Author:
    Mark A. Greenwood
    See Also:
    MeasurementsParser

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDimension()
      Returns the dimension (or type) of the measurement, such as length, time, area, etc.
      String getNormalizedUnit()
      Returns the unit reduced down to it's most basic form.
      Double getNormalizedValue()
      Returns the value of the measurement once the unit has been normalized to it's base SI form.
      String getParsedText()
      Returns the text that was parsed into a measurement
      String getUnit()
      Returns the unit recognised in the parsed text.
      Double getValue()
      Returns The double value of this measurement as determined from the parsed text
      String toString()
      Constructs a printable string representation of this measurement

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getNormalizedValue

        public Double getNormalizedValue()
        Returns the value of the measurement once the unit has been normalized to it's base SI form.
        Returns:
        the value of the measurement once the unit has been normalized to it's base SI form
        See Also:
        getNormalizedUnit()

      • getNormalizedUnit

        public String getNormalizedUnit()
        Returns the unit reduced down to it's most basic form. This normalized form usually consists solely of SI units. This normalized form can be used to compare measurements of the same dimension specified using different units as they will all reduce to the same base unit.
        Returns:
        the unit reduced to it's most basic form.
        See Also:
        SI Units

      • getValue

        public Double getValue()
        Returns The double value of this measurement as determined from the parsed text
        Returns:
        the double value of this measurement as determined from the parsed text

      • getUnit

        public String getUnit()
        Returns the unit recognised in the parsed text. Note that this doesn't have to be the same as the text that was parsed. For example, this method will return "mile" even if it has parsed the string "miles"
        Returns:
        the unit recognised in the parsed text

      • getParsedText

        public String getParsedText()
        Returns the text that was parsed into a measurement
        Returns:
        the text that was parsed into a measurement

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Constructs a printable string representation of this measurement
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        printable representation of this measurement

        public String getDimension()
